text: Nocardiopsis halophila is a halophilic bacterium from the genus of Nocardiopsis which has been isolated from saline soil in Iraq.UniProtDeutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardiopsis halophila at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Actinomycetales Category:Bacteria described in 1994
title: Nocardiopsis halophila
